hero.memojiComputerAlt: A girl peeking from behind her laptop
hero.heroTitle: Ideas into Web and Mobile Solutions
hero.heroDescription: I transform your ideas into functional, high-performing web and mobile applications.

projects.headerSubtitle: Some of the work I've done
projects.headerDesc: Here are a few projects that showcase my skills and passion for development.

portfolioProjects.title: InternHub
portfolioProjects.desc: InternHub is an innovative platform designed to streamline the internship application process.

features.feature: Secure user authentication with login functionality.
Automatic login functionality for returning users.
Integration with the JSearch API for diversified internship listings.
Advanced search filters to help users find suitable opportunities.
Bookmarking system to save preferred internship listings.

portfolioProjects.title: To Do App
portfolioProjects.desc: The To Do App is a productivity tool designed to help users efficiently manage their tasks.

features.feature: Skeleton loading screens during data fetching for a better user experience.
Secure user authentication for personalized access.
Automatic user login to streamline access and save time.
Dedicated pages for managing completed and pending tasks.

portfolioProjects.title: PetPedia
portfolioProjects.desc: A platform for adopting, rehoming, and learning about animals.

features.feature: Ongoing development with plans for advanced search filters and adoption management.

about.headerDesc: I'm passionate about creating meaningful digital experiences that combine functionality and aesthetics.
about.cardDesc: A collection of technologies and tools I use to bring ideas to life.
about.cardDesc2: When I'm not coding, you can find me enjoying these activities.

experiences.headerDesc: Here is an overview of my professional experience.

results.title: Developed a responsive web application to enhance user engagement.
Integrated APIs for seamless data exchange and functionality.
Collaborated with a team using Agile methodology to meet project goals.
Assisted in building dynamic web components using React.
Performed code reviews to ensure quality and adherence to standards.
Participated in daily stand-up meetings and sprint planning sessions.

contact.contactText: Feel free to reach out if you want to collaborate on a project or just say hi!
